txt.en: Bring your small stick back to Carnelian Bracegirdle
Don't leave the field!
Left the field!
Hobnanigans is simple. You and your teammates must help urge a chicken into the red goal as many times as possible within the allotted time. Protect your blue goal from the other team scoring.
Scored goals (1/3)
Scored goals (2/3)

'So you want to join the Steel Beaks, do you? Fine then, come on and play a round of Hobnanigans. You must wait for two others to join your team and then you shall play for the right to become a winner in the great Chicken Chasing League of Eriador. This is no small honour!\n\n'Simply gather a blue stick from the field and get ready to begin. Hurry, hurry -- only the first three people to join the Steel Beaks can play this round.  The game will start when all six sticks have been taken!'
Score goals (0/3)
The blue sticks are on the field.\n\nBelba Hardbottle, the Captain of the Steel Beaks, has asked you to gather a blue stick from the field and then get ready to play.
'Well done! You have done the Steel Beaks proud! You can now carry the badge of Steel Beak Member proudly! We hope you will come and play again some time!'
You have played a game of Hobnanigans!
Score three goals within the allotted amount of time.
'Did you destroy the stick? Where is it? Thief! You take our sticks and just think you can run around the world with them?'
Score three goals within the allotted amount of time.
Score goals (1/3)
Score as many goals as you can within the allotted time.
Carnelian Bracegirdle, the Steel Beaks Captain, is standing next to Hobnanigan Field near the Bree Fairgrounds.\n\nSpeak to Carnelian Bracegirdle to claim your prize.
Play a game of Hobnanigans
Take a blue stick from the field
You left the field!
Take a blue stick from the field
Do not leave the field of play
A Game of Hobnanigans -- Steel Beaks - Field 3
